title: 276. No Hollywood Ending for the Visual-Effects Industry
description: In their chase for a global audience, American movie studios spend billions to make their films look amazing. But almost none of those dollars stay in America. What would it take to bring those jobs back -- and would it be worth it?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
